meaningMnemonic: You have a <radical>number</radical>ed <radical>feather</radical>. Pick your favorite number and put it on the feather. Then, put the numbered feather on your head. When you put it on, you're able to <kanji>flip</kanji> and <kanji>flip</kanji> over and over.
readingMnemonic: You're pretty good at your <kanji>flip</kanji> technique, but you're not that good. You really need to practice and <reading>hone</reading> (ほん) your skills and get better.
